// DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE. This file will be overwritten when re-running go-raml.
package main

import (
	"github.com/gorilla/mux"
	"net/http"
)

// HelloworldInterface is interface for /helloworld root endpoint
type HelloworldInterface interface { // Get is the handler for GET /helloworld
	Get(http.ResponseWriter, *http.Request)
}

// HelloworldInterfaceRoutes is routing for /helloworld root endpoint
func HelloworldInterfaceRoutes(r *mux.Router, i HelloworldInterface) {
	r.HandleFunc("/helloworld", i.Get).Methods("GET")
}
